channel.name: Law & Crime US

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Officers stop a man on a bike who matches the description of a robbery suspect, the man runs until he falls and is arrested; three men are detained when found hanging out in a heavy drug alley; a boyfriend is arrested for pushing his girlfriend.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Officers find a man in someone else's home who is wanted for domestic violence restraining order and a burglary; a man tries to swallow a bag of weed as he is pulled over; a woman stabs another man in the arm with scissors and is arrested.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Police ask a man to step out of his car when they spot marijuana, when he does he runs and hides under a car and is held at gunpoint until he comes out; a female is detained for stabbing a man with scissors and drug possession.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: Officers chase after a stolen vehicle until the operator clips the side of a taxi, wraps around a steel pole and is taken into custody; an undercover cop poses as a prostitute and arrests every man who is soliciting sex.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: A man that has been arrested soliciting money is doing it again; a disturbance call is made when a father-in-law threatens a couple with knives because he thinks they stole his drugs.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: A high speed chase ensues when cops go after a stolen truck; a daughter calls the cops on her father when he threatens to kill her because she was accusing him of cheating on her.

channel.title: Jail

channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention; twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police; a man in women's clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.
